name: Vishnu Dayal Shiksha Samiti

address: 529K/197, Sant Kabir Lane, Khurram Nagar, Lucknow

briefDescription: Vishnu DayalShikshaSamiti was established on 19th October 2004 as a society, under Society Registration Act 1860 at Lucknow with a vision to work for unprivileged section of society. Since then we are working in different fields to fulfill our vision. Our main focus is on running employment orient training programmes.We are working for Persons with Disability also since 5 Years. We also get Registered under Persons with Disability Act 1995 in Uttar Pradesh ( Reg. No.- 2661/2013-14) on dated 05-03-2014. Since then we are also starts working exclusively for mentally retarded persons.  We also planning for establishment of  hospital for mentally retarded persons with full facilities.
